body_html:
Thanks for the feedback, but there are no plans to add this feature at this time.
However, you can bookmark an older version: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.7/api_docs/python/
And we are planning to add a /stable/ directory that points to the latest release.

body:
Thanks for the feedback, but there are no plans to add this feature at this time.
However, you can bookmark an older version: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.7/api_docs/python/
And we are planning to add a /stable/ directory that points to the latest release.
